attributes.action: Remove Boris Johnson from office for breaking the law
attributes.background: Boris Johnson was found to have prorogued parliament unlawfully and to have mislead Her Majesty the Queen on Tuesday 24th September 2019. Having had no regard for the law or no apology in the House of Commons, he should be removed from office.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
